comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Northrop P-61B-1-NO Black Widow 42-39405 'The Spook' 548th Night Fighter Squadron. Some sources say it was 42-39403. This aircraft was written off in April 1945 on Iwo Jima when it crash landed in the dark and fog, hitting another P-61 on the ground. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/18532986@N07/4481146610/in/set-72157614565427377]
